name: ab-testing
description: Lambda functions to be used as Lambda@Edge for A/B testing

scripts.build: mustache build/data.json src/viewerRequest.mustache > build/viewerRequest.js && mustache build/data.json src/originRequest.mustache > build/originRequest.js && mustache build/data.json src/originResponse.mustache > build/originResponse.js

author: Lorenzo Nicora <lorenzo.nicora@gmail.com>
